content: Total revenue for the quarter increased 1% from the prior quarter, due mainly to lower money market fund minimum yield-related waivers, an increase of $34.3 million, and $2 million from higher average money market assets, offset by lower average equity assets, reducing revenue by $17.4 million, fewer days in the quarter, reducing revenue by $9.3 million, lower carried interest and performance fees of $3.6 million, and lower average fixed income assets, reducing revenue by $2.4 million.
